install.name: YouTube Feed Display
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module allows to display a youtube playlist feed

param.name: rssurl
param.label: Feed URL
param.description: Enter the URL of the RSS feed

param.name: feedtitle
param.label: Alternative Title
param.description: Title to display instead of the feed title

param.name: rssdesc
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show the description text for the whole Feed

param.name: feeddesc
param.label: Alternative Description
param.description: Description to display instead of the feed description

param.name: imagepath
param.label: Path to YouTube image
param.description: Enter the path to YouTube image

param.name: rssitems
param.label: Items
param.description: Enter number of RSS items to display

param.name: pick_random
param.label: Random items
param.description: Display items in random or feed-defined order

param.name: webpath
param.label: Local Path to Thumbnails
param.description: Enter the path to store video thumbnails locally

param.name: layout
param.label: Layout
param.description: Select whether to display items vertically or horizontally

param.name: showmorelink
param.label: Show View More link
param.description: Show the link to all videos

param.name: moreurl
param.label: View More URL
param.description: Enter the URL to more videos

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time in minutes before the module is re-cached.
